headline: Ask HN: Who would be interested in a platform for text based job interviews
description:
I'm currently looking for a new job, and I have a problem: I absolutely hate job interviews. I have an irrational fear of them. I get so anxious I can't sleep days before the interview. During the interview, I'm the worst possible version of myself, and my brain just shuts down. I can't answer the basic questions and I make the impression that I don't know what I'm talking about.

I have 10 years of professional experience, I have a good CV and I think I'm actually good at my job. But I don't think I will get a job like this. (And I'm not really looking anymore, because I don't want to put myself in that situation again)

So I thought: if this is happening to me, it must happen to others!

There must be thousands of great developers out there, who don't switch jobs, who don't apply to a position which they would be a perfect fit for, simply because they loathe job interviews, are shy, introverted or have social anxiety...

And companies are missing out on great developers. They are basically filtering out anyone who isn't good at interviewing. I get that for some companies or some positions, talking on the phone or per video chat is part of the job. But not for (every) software developer jobs?

I know that at least one company, Automattic, is conducting their job interviews via text. So it must work, even on the scale of a company with ~1000 of employees.

Maybe there are more?

I'm starting a wait list, and if you are in the same position as me: you want a new job, but you would like to do job interviews via text, please sign up. If there are enough people on the wait list, I will start a new platform, and try to convince other companies use this completely untapped source for new tech talent.

Wait list for developers: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScxkdroJ4NrOZFi_HTwEtR7szPKg4uQE_1WUEH9vuEznOEvZw/viewform

If you are hiring and are interested in this, sign up here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSePfriC4xwSEUbw8u05UGfLUVpyGBGS79wFInEYrqQnYxPxJA/viewform
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 谁会对基于文本的工作面试平台感兴趣？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 誰會對基於文本的工作面試平臺感興趣？
description_zh-Hans:
我目前正在寻找一份新工作，我有一个问题：我绝对讨厌工作面试。我对它们有一种非理性的恐惧。我非常焦虑，在面试前几天无法入睡。在面试期间，我是最糟糕的自己，我的大脑只是关闭了。我无法回答基本问题，给人的印象是我不知道自己在说什么。

我有10年的专业经验，我有一份好的简历，我认为我实际上很擅长我的工作。但我不认为我会得到这样的工作。(而且我已经不怎么找了，因为我不想再让自己陷入这种境地)

所以我想：如果这种情况发生在我身上，那就一定会发生在其他人身上！

肯定有成千上万的优秀开发人员没有换工作，没有申请到他们最适合的职位，只是因为他们厌恶求职面试，害羞、内向或有社交焦虑......

而公司正在错过优秀的开发人员。他们基本上是在过滤那些不擅长面试的人。我明白，对于某些公司或某些职位来说，通过电话或视频聊天是工作的一部分。但对于（每一个）软件开发人员的工作来说就不是这样了吗？

我知道至少有一家公司，Automattic，正在通过文本进行他们的工作面试。

也许还有更多？

我正在启动一个等待名单，如果你和我有同样的情况：你想要一份新工作，但你想通过短信进行工作面试，请注册。如果等待名单上有足够多的人，我将启动一个新的平台，并试图说服其他公司使用这个完全未开发的新技术人才来源。

开发人员的等待名单：https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScxkdroJ4NrOZFi_HTwEtR7szPKg4uQE_1WUEH9vuEznOEvZw/viewform

如果你正在招聘并对此感兴趣，请在这里注册：https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSePfriC4xwSEUbw8u05UGfLUVpyGBGS79wFInEYrqQnYxPxJA/viewform
